website_summaries.verdict: Men looking for high-quality skates to last for years to come should check out this durable pair.
pros: Available for purchase in various colors
Customers appreciate the securing hook-and-loop strap and high-quality laces
Sizing fits well for most buyers
cons: A few customers had issues with shipping, as well as their product arriving damaged

customer_reviews.title: Great for fresh meat derby skaters
customer_reviews.text: Good basic skate for someone just starting roller derby. In this Riedell model, women should order one size down. I wear a women’s size 9, and this boot size 8 is a good fit. I do recommend adding toe guards if using these skates for derby. And the gumball stoppers are a must!
customer_reviews.author: RKS

customer_reviews.title: They’re ok.
customer_reviews.text: So, I didn’t listen to my coach and ordered online. My left skate kept veering to the left, so I couldn’t do anything during derby practice. We adjusted it many times and it still did that. I will be returning and buying a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Calypso

customer_reviews.title: Really fast skates
customer_reviews.text: They fit just perfect! Really good skates. It brings a tool but i also ordered a T tool for it and sure grip aluminum plates to add later on😎 very durable skates i have them for almost a year and they are in really good condition. I use them at the skatepark so if the front start to shred just get a front boot cover.
customer_reviews.author: ishmael canela

customer_reviews.title: Love my skates
customer_reviews.text: Love my skates.... but they did not come with the upgraded wheels. The ones I received came with the black cayman default wheels and I was very very disappointed I had to use them since I had derby practice that night but I am still trying to find a way to remedy the situation
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: First Time back ok skates in 20 years. These worked out very well. I wear a 9 1/2 in Vans and Merrells so I purchased a size 9 skate, the fit was perfect! I highly suggest way tightening the trucks especially if you have extra weight on you.
customer_reviews.author: Soundpro707

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy boot
customer_reviews.text: I used to speed skate this is a good skater they plate is a little heavy. But it’s good quality boots and wheels are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who is an intermediate skater, and he loves them! Good quality boot, plate and wheels and bearings. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: B. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: super good skates.
customer_reviews.text: Riedell R3 Demon Roller Skates.arrive earlier than expected.super good skates. A little loose but they come we a tool to put them to your liking. I put them to my liking and I was about 4 hours skating and did not find any problem.I bought a larger number than what I use. For example if you are a man and use 9 "buy a 10". I recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jorge alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Love my new skates
customer_reviews.text: Love my new skates! I haven't skated in years due to an ankle surgery and am finally ready, 6 years later. These are fast skates.
customer_reviews.author: paintedwagonpix

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The skate boot is well made. The bearings will need to be upgraded after you are comfortable with your skates. The trucks are loose. You will have to adjust to suit your comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Riedell R3 Deamon
customer_reviews.text: Good beginner to intermediate speed skates. Good quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice skates
customer_reviews.text: The fit is very snug. Skates are quality not junk like most other skates on the market for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hagar

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and FAST!
customer_reviews.text: I love these but if you're getting back into skating be careful at first, these wheels/bearing are quite fast. Overall very smooth ride. My only slight complaint is that the liner on the insole separated on the first time out with them. Kinda disappointed in that but, things happen, still 5 stars for function. UPDATE: Riedell replaced the insoles, although it was noticeably lesser quality. On my second time out with the skates, the the right toe stop came flying off while skating, luckily it didn't cause me or anyone else to wipe out. A worthy tip.......Check everything on the skates an be sure the bolts are tight. Overall, still love the skates. Very comfortable and a smooth ride.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates
customer_reviews.text: My adult daughter wanted these as she manages a skate deck and they are great quality and she loves them very expensive but worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R

product_meta.title: Riedell Black R3 Demon EDM Roller Derby Speed Skates
product_meta.description: A perfect combination of performance and value has made the R3 the most popular roller skate in rinks everywhere. The R3 Demon Skate Setoffers the precision-fit R3 boot with a durable PowerDyne Thrust nylon plate and Sonar Demon EDM wheels–a quality MDI recreational wheel loaded with roll and available in eight fun colors. Get your R3 Demons with eight wheels of the same color or mix and match two colors for extra style.
feature_bullets: Boot: R3.Comfortable man-made vinyl uppers Lots of padding
Wheels: Sonar Demon EDM Choice of color: Black, Blue, Green, Orange, Pink, Purple, Red, or Yellow
